mapper.sql: select id, template_id, detect_title, type, unit_type, module_type, detect_module, parent_id, first_code, first_content, secondary_code, secondary_content, weights, weights_c_es, weights_c_nes, weights_d_es, weights_d_nes, attribution, output, max_score, view, view_parent_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from intuitive_detect_data
mapper.select: select d.id, d.template_id, d.detect_title, d.type, d.unit_type, d.module_type, d.detect_module, d.parent_id, d.first_code, d.first_content, d.secondary_code, d.secondary_content, d.weights, d.weights_c_es, d.weights_c_nes, d.weights_d_es, d.weights_d_nes, d.attribution, d.output, d.max_score, d.view, d.view_parent_id, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, (select count(1) from owner_unit_danger ud where ud.form_data_id = d.id and ud.unit_id = #{unitId} ) as danger from intuitive_detect_data d where d.template_id = #{templateId} and d.output = '1' order by d.weights asc, d.first_code asc, d.id asc
mapper.insert:
insert into intuitive_detect_data
template_id, detect_title, type, unit_type, module_type, detect_module, parent_id, first_code, first_content, secondary_code, secondary_content, weights, weights_c_es, weights_c_nes, weights_d_es, weights_d_nes, attribution, output, max_score, view, view_parent_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{templateId}, #{detectTitle}, #{type}, #{unitType}, #{moduleType}, #{detectModule}, #{parentId}, #{firstCode}, #{firstContent}, #{secondaryCode}, #{secondaryContent}, #{weights}, #{weightsCEs}, #{weightsCNes}, #{weightsDEs}, #{weightsDNes}, #{attribution,typeHandler=com.ruoyi.electrical.type.ListStringTypeHandler}, #{output}, #{maxScore}, #{view}, #{viewParentId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.update:
update intuitive_detect_data set view_parent_id = null where id in
#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from intuitive_detect_data where template_id = #{templateId} and unit_type = #{unitType}

delete from intuitive_detect_data where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select d.id, d.template_id, d.detect_title, d.type, d.unit_type, d.module_type, d.detect_module, d.parent_id, d.first_code, d.first_content, d.secondary_code, d.secondary_content, d.weights, d.weights_c_es, d.weights_c_nes, d.weights_d_es, d.weights_d_nes, d.attribution, d.output, d.max_score, d.view, d.view_parent_id, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time , (select count(1) from owner_unit_danger ud where ud.unit_id=#{unitId} and ud.form_data_id = d.id) as dangers from intuitive_detect_data d where d.template_id = #{templateId} order by d.weights asc
